thread.section_title: Kiwi Sheepskins Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Kiwi Sheepskins | kiwisheepskins.com
thread.title: David

author: David
title: David
text: I have been wearing Sheepskin boots and slippers since 1985 and have purchased both UGG and other brands including custom made. Recently I purchased two pair of the Kiwi Boots and found them to be equal or superior to any I have previously owned as to comfort and durability. Prices are reasonable especially since they generally include shipping costs as well as product price. I highly recommend Kiwi Sheepskins.
